SETTINGS.EDITED_AFFLICTIONS_HINT: View and manage all customized affliction definitions
SETTINGS.SHOW_INDICATORS_HINT: Display biohazard icon on tokens with active afflictions
SETTINGS.AUTO_DETECT_HINT: Automatically detect poison/disease/curse items and prompt for initial saves
SETTINGS.AUTO_PROMPT_SAVES_HINT: Automatically prompt for saves when game time elapses outside combat
SETTINGS.STORYFRAME_HINT: Send save and counteract rolls through Storyframe module
SETTINGS.REQUIRE_CONFIRMATION_HINT: Require GM confirmation before applying save consequences (allows hero point rerolls)
SETTINGS.ANONYMIZE_SAVES_HINT: Hide affliction details in player save messages. Players see only "Fortitude Save Required" without affliction name, stage, or effects. Works with automatic unidentified effects to keep afflictions mysterious.
SETTINGS.GM_ROLL_MYSTERIOUS_HINT: GM rolls initial saves for mysterious afflictions (onset or no stage 1 mechanical effects). Players never see the save request, maintaining complete secrecy.
SETTINGS.USE_APP_INITIATIVE_HINT: When enabled, affliction saves trigger on the same initiative step the affliction was first applied, rather than the afflicted token's own initiative. Unofficial rule — not explicitly stated in the PF2e rulebook.
SETTINGS.COMMUNITY_DATA_VERSION_HINT: Version of community afflictions data last imported

MANAGER.TITLE: Affliction Manager
MANAGER.CLEAR_ALL_CONFIRM_CONTENT: This will remove all afflictions from all visible tokens. This action cannot be undone.
MANAGER.MANUAL_HANDLING_REQUIRED: This stage requires manual handling by the GM
MANAGER.AT_STAGE_ONE: {tokenName} is already at stage 1 of {afflictionName}. Use "Remove Affliction" to cure.
MANAGER.NO_ACTIVE_STAGE: No active stage to roll damage for
MANAGER.NO_DAMAGE_TO_ROLL: {name} Stage {stage} has no damage to roll
MANAGER.ROLLED_DAMAGE: Rolled {total} damage for {tokenName} - Click the Damage button in the chat card to apply with resistances
MANAGER.REMOVED_FROM_TRACKING_EXPIRES: Removed {afflictionName} from tracking. Effect will expire after {value} {unit}(s).
MANAGER.REMOVED_FROM_TRACKING_PERSISTS: Removed {afflictionName} from tracking. Effect and conditions persist on {tokenName} per PF2e rules.

DIALOG.DROP_ITEM: Drag and drop an item with poison, disease, or curse trait here
DIALOG.NO_ITEMS: No affliction items found. Drag an item here or use manual entry.
DIALOG.AFFLICTION_ADDED: Affliction added. Use the edit button to customize stages and effects.
DIALOG.CLEANSE_STAGE_NOTE: This will reduce the affliction stage by 1. This reduction can only be applied once to this affliction.

EDITOR.TITLE: Edit Affliction
EDITOR.VIRULENT_HINT: Success has no effect; critical success reduces by only 1 stage
EDITOR.CONFIRM_REMOVE_STAGE: Remove Stage {number}? This cannot be undone.
EDITOR.CHANGES_SAVED: Changes saved. Will apply to future afflictions.
EDITOR.CONFIRM_RESET: Remove custom edits? Original definition will be used.
EDITOR.PARSE_EFFECTS_TOOLTIP: Auto-extract damage, conditions, and weakness from text
EDITOR.DROP_EFFECTS: Drag effect items here to auto-apply when this stage becomes active
EDITOR.CANNOT_REMOVE_LAST_STAGE: Cannot remove the last stage. Afflictions must have at least one stage.
EDITOR.MAX_DURATION_REMOVED: Maximum duration removed (affliction is now indefinite)
EDITOR.EFFECTS_PARSED: Effects text parsed and added to stage details
EDITOR.CLEAR_ALL_EFFECTS_CONTENT: Remove all auto-applied effects from this stage?

EDITED_MANAGER.TITLE: Edited Afflictions
EDITED_MANAGER.NO_EDITS: No edited afflictions found. Use the edit button in the Affliction Manager to customize afflictions.
EDITED_MANAGER.DROP_HINT: Drag and drop a poison, disease, or curse item here to customize it
EDITED_MANAGER.CONFIRM_DELETE: Remove edit for {name}? Original definition will be used.
EDITED_MANAGER.EXPORT_TOOLTIP: Export all edited afflictions to JSON file
EDITED_MANAGER.IMPORT_TOOLTIP: Import edited afflictions from JSON file
EDITED_MANAGER.IMPORT_NO_CONFLICTS: No conflicts detected - all will be imported.

NOTIFICATIONS.NO_DC_FOUND: No DC found for affliction item "{itemName}".
NOTIFICATIONS.ALREADY_TREATED: This affliction has already been treated this stage
NOTIFICATIONS.SELECT_TOKEN: Select a token to perform treatment
NOTIFICATIONS.MANUAL_EFFECTS: Stage effects require manual handling - please apply effects to {tokenName}
NOTIFICATIONS.MULTIPLE_EXPOSURE: {tokenName} is exposed to {afflictionName} again - stage increased by {stageIncrease} to stage {newStage}!
NOTIFICATIONS.MULTIPLE_EXPOSURE_NO_EFFECT: {tokenName} is exposed to {afflictionName} again, but current stage is too low (minimum stage {minStage} required)
NOTIFICATIONS.MULTIPLE_EXPOSURE_NO_EFFECT_DEFAULT: {tokenName} is exposed to {afflictionName} ({type}) again, but multiple exposures have no effect
NOTIFICATIONS.POISON_RE_EXPOSURE: {tokenName} is exposed to {afflictionName} again - poison stage increased by {stageIncrease}!
NOTIFICATIONS.VIRULENT_CONSECUTIVE_SUCCESS: {tokenName} succeeded against {afflictionName} (virulent) - one more success needed to reduce stage
NOTIFICATIONS.COUNTERACT_FAILED: Counteract failed: {afflictionName} (Affliction Rank {afflictionRank} vs Counteract Rank {counteractRank}) - Degree of Success: {degree}
NOTIFICATIONS.MAX_DURATION_EXPIRED: {afflictionName} on {tokenName} has reached maximum duration. Check chat for removal button.
NOTIFICATIONS.STORYFRAME_SAVE_REQUESTED: Fortitude save requested from {actorName} via Storyframe
NOTIFICATIONS.CAN_COUNTERACT_RANGE: Can counteract up to rank {maxRank} — affliction rank {afflictionRank} is within range.
NOTIFICATIONS.CANNOT_COUNTERACT_RANK: Can counteract up to rank {maxRank}, but affliction is rank {afflictionRank}.

ERRORS.GM_ONLY_MANAGER: Only GMs can access the Affliction Manager
ERRORS.GM_ONLY_EDITED_MANAGER: Only GMs can access the Edited Afflictions Manager
ERRORS.GM_ONLY_EDITOR: Only GMs can edit affliction definitions
ERRORS.GM_ONLY_DEFINITIONS: Only GMs can manage affliction definitions
ERRORS.COULD_NOT_PARSE: Could not parse affliction from item
ERRORS.ITEM_MUST_HAVE_TRAIT: Item must have poison or disease trait
ERRORS.ITEM_MUST_HAVE_TRAIT_FULL: Item must have poison, disease, or curse trait
ERRORS.AFFLICTION_SKIPPED: Affliction has no valid stages or DC, skipping
ERRORS.FAILED_IMPORT: Failed to import file. Check console for details.
ERRORS.ONLY_ITEMS_ALLOWED: Only items can be dropped here
ERRORS.ONLY_EFFECT_ITEMS: Only effect items can be dropped here
ERRORS.ONLY_EFFECT_ITEMS_ADD: Only effect items can be added
ERRORS.EFFECT_ALREADY_ADDED: Effect already added to this stage
ERRORS.EFFECT_NOT_FOUND: Effect not found or has no sheet
ERRORS.SELECT_TOKEN_OR_DROP: Please select a token or drop on a token section
ERRORS.COULD_NOT_READ_ROLL: Could not read roll result from message
ERRORS.NO_SPELLCASTING_OR_SKILL: No {tradition} spellcasting or {skill} skill found. Select the caster token first.
ERRORS.NO_SKILL_FOUND: No {skill} skill found. Select the caster token first.
ERRORS.FAILED_PREPARE_AFFLICTION: Failed to prepare affliction for editing

BUTTONS.DRAG_HINT: Drag to Affliction Manager to apply

SAVE_CONFIRMATION.IF_REROLLED: If rerolled, click will use latest result

CONFLICT.TITLE: Import Conflicts
CONFLICT.MERGE_INSTRUCTIONS: Select which version to use for each field
CONFLICT.CONFLICTS_REMAINING: Please resolve all conflicts before importing
CONFLICT.NO_CONFLICTS_MESSAGE: All {count} incoming afflictions can be imported automatically
CONFLICT.CANCEL_IMPORT_CONTENT: Cancel import? All conflict resolutions will be lost.

MONITOR.CLICK_TOKEN_HINT: Click token name to open manager for that token

CHAT.GM_MYSTERIOUS_REASON: This affliction is mysterious - GM rolls in secret (blind roll)
CHAT.NEEDS_FORTITUDE_SAVE: needs to make a Fortitude save
CHAT.MAKE_FORTITUDE_RESIST: Make a Fortitude save to resist the affliction
CHAT.VIRULENT_NOTE: Virulent: Success has no effect, critical success reduces by only 1 stage
CHAT.CLICK_DAMAGE_LINK: Click the damage link above to roll and apply
CHAT.MAX_DURATION_REACHED_NOTE: affliction has reached its maximum duration ({duration})
CHAT.MAX_DURATION_PERSIST_NOTE: The affliction should be removed, but any imposed conditions persist per PF2e rules.
CHAT.REACHED_LETHAL_STAGE: has reached a lethal stage of {afflictionName} (Stage {stage})
CHAT.LETHAL_NOTE: The affliction description indicates the creature dies at this stage.
CHAT.FAILED_INITIAL_SAVE_STAGE: Failed initial save: Stage increased by {stageIncrease} (now Stage {newStage})
